attributes.action: Ban all rawhide products listed under dog treats.
attributes.additional_details: I have been written to by alot of people complaining that these treats have killed and choked there dogs, aswell as cause the animal major discomfort after digesting these product which has resulted in emergency vet appointments. They are made with sodium sulpher liming, glue, bleach and colourings all of which is harmful for animals.
attributes.background: I would like the pet food standards agency to withdraw all rawhide pet treats from suppliers in the uk.
